original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā kosambiyaṁ viharati ghositārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā kosambiyam viharati ghosita ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā channo anācāraṁ ācarati.
analyzed: tena khalu pana samayena āyasmā channaḥ anācāram ācarati

original: “na tāvāhaṁ, āvuso, etasmiṁ sikkhāpade sikkhissāmi yāva na aññaṁ bhikkhuṁ byattaṁ vinayadharaṁ paripucchāmī”ti.
analyzed: na tāva āha āvuso etasmim sikkhāpade sikkhissāmi yāva na aññam bhikkhum byattam vinaya dharam paripucchāmi iti

original: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: ye te bhikkhū appicchā pe te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma āyasmā channo bhikkhūhi sahadhammikaṁ vuccamāno evaṁ vakkhati—
analyzed: katham hi nāma āyasmā channaḥ bhikkhūhi sahadhammikam vuccamānaḥ evam vakkhati

original: ‘na tāvāhaṁ, āvuso, etasmiṁ sikkhāpade sikkhissāmi yāva na aññaṁ bhikkhuṁ byattaṁ vinayadharaṁ paripucchāmī’”ti …pe…
analyzed: na tāva āha āvuso etasmim sikkhāpade sikkhissāmi yāva na aññam bhikkhum byattam vinaya dharam paripucchāmi iti pe

original: “saccaṁ kira tvaṁ, channa, bhikkhūhi sahadhammikaṁ vuccamāno evaṁ vadesi—
analyzed: saccam kira tva channa bhikkhūhi sahadhammikam vuccamānaḥ evam vadesi

original: ‘na tāvāhaṁ, āvuso, etasmiṁ sikkhāpade sikkhissāmi yāva na aññaṁ bhikkhuṁ byattaṁ vinayadharaṁ paripucchāmī’”ti?
analyzed: na tāva āha āvuso etasmim sikkhāpade sikkhissāmi yāva na aññam bhikkhum byattam vinaya dharam paripucchāmi iti

original: kathañhi nāma tvaṁ, moghapurisa, bhikkhūhi sahadhammikaṁ vuccamāno evaṁ vakkhasi—
analyzed: katham hi nāma tva moghapurisa bhikkhūhi sahadhammikam vuccamānaḥ evam vakkhasi

original: ‘na tāvāhaṁ, āvuso, etasmiṁ sikkhāpade sikkhissāmi yāva na aññaṁ bhikkhuṁ byattaṁ vinayadharaṁ paripucchāmī’ti.
analyzed: na tāva āha āvuso etasmim sikkhāpade sikkhissāmi yāva na aññam bhikkhum byattam vinaya dharam paripucchāmi iti
neta moghapurisa appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha

original: “Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhūhi sahadhammikaṁ vuccamāno evaṁ vadeyya—‘na tāvāhaṁ, āvuso,
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu bhikkhūhi sahadhammikam vuccamānaḥ evam vadeyyana tāva āha āvuso

original: etasmiṁ sikkhāpade sikkhissāmi yāva na aññaṁ bhikkhuṁ byattaṁ vinayadharaṁ paripucchāmī’ti, pācittiyaṁ.
analyzed: etasmim sikkhāpade sikkhissāmi yāva na aññam bhikkhum byattam vinaya dharam paripucchāmi iti pācittiya

original: Sikkhamānena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā aññātabbaṁ paripucchitabbaṁ paripañhitabbaṁ. Ayaṁ tattha sāmīcī”ti.
analyzed: sikkhamānena bhikkhave bhikkhunā aññātabbam paripucchitabbam paripañhitabba ayam tattha sāmīcī iti
pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetaḥ bhikkhu iti

original: yaṁ bhagavatā paññattaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ etaṁ sahadhammikaṁ nāma.
analyzed: yam bhagavatā paññattam sikkhāpadam etam sahadhammikam nāma

original: Tena vuccamāno evaṁ vadeti— “na tāvāhaṁ, āvuso, etasmiṁ sikkhāpade sikkhissāmi yāva
analyzed: tena vuccamānaḥ evam vadeti na tāva āha āvuso etasmim sikkhāpade sikkhissāmi yāva

original: na aññaṁ bhikkhuṁ byattaṁ vinayadharaṁ paripucchāmī”ti. Paṇḍitaṁ byattaṁ medhāviṁ
analyzed: na aññam bhikkhum byattam vinaya dharam paripucchāmi iti paṇḍitam byattam medhāvi

original: bahussutaṁ dhammakathikaṁ paripucchāmīti bhaṇati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: bahussutam dhamma kathikam paripucchāmi iti bhaṇati āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Upasampanne upasampannasaññī evaṁ vadeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: upasampanne upasampanna saññī evam vadeti āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Upasampanne vematiko evaṁ vadeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: upasampanne vematikaḥ evam vadeti āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Upasampanne anupasampannasaññī evaṁ vadeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: upasampanne anupasampanna saññī evam vadeti āpatti pācittiyassa

original: “idaṁ na sallekhāya na dhutatthāya na pāsādikatāya na apacayāya na vīriyārambhāya
analyzed: idam na sallekhāya na dhutatthāya na pāsādikatāya na apacayāya na vīriya ārambhāya

original: saṁvattatī”ti evaṁ vadeti, “na tāvāhaṁ, āvuso, etasmiṁ sikkhāpade sikkhissāmi yāva
analyzed: evam vadeti na tāva āha āvuso etasmim sikkhāpade sikkhissāmi yāva

original: na aññaṁ bhikkhuṁ byattaṁ vinayadharaṁ paṇḍitaṁ medhāviṁ bahussutaṁ dhammakathikaṁ
analyzed: na aññam bhikkhum byattam vinaya dharam paṇḍitam medhāvim bahu sutam dhamma kathika

original: Anupasampannena paññattena vā apaññattena vā vuccamāno—
analyzed: an upasampannena paññattena vā a paññattena vā vuccamānaḥ

original: “idaṁ na sallekhāya na dhutatthāya na pāsādikatāya na apacayāya na vīriyārambhāya
analyzed: idam na sallekhāya na dhutatthāya na pāsādikatāya na apacayāya na vīriya ārambhāya

original: saṁvattatī”ti evaṁ vadeti, “na tāvāhaṁ, āvuso, etasmiṁ sikkhāpade sikkhissāmi yāva
analyzed: evam vadeti na tāva āha āvuso etasmim sikkhāpade sikkhissāmi yāva

original: na aññaṁ bhikkhuṁ byattaṁ vinayadharaṁ paṇḍitaṁ medhāviṁ bahussutaṁ dhammakathikaṁ
analyzed: na aññam bhikkhum byattam vinaya dharam paṇḍitam medhāvim bahu sutam dhamma kathika
an upasampanne upasampanna saññī āpatti dukkaṭassa
an upasampanne an upasampanna saññī āpatti dukkaṭassa
ida bhante katha imassa vā kvattho ti
